svg.content:
<mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-12-14T11:33:15.749Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/22.1.2 Chrome/114.0.5735.289 Electron/25.9.4 Safari/537.36" etag="fWYusGhlznA8Fi5qhJuD" version="22.1.2" type="device"> <diagram name="Страница — 1" id="o-5-TafTOnzuuA7DQpzO"> <mxGraphModel dx="1098" dy="868" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-1" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;verticalAlign=middle;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-2" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="150" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="145" y="75" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-2" value="Цикл по точкам модели" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.loop_limit;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="110" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-3" value="Начало" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="20" width="250" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-4" value="Рассчитать коэффициент фонового освещения 
(грубое приближение лучей света, 
рассеянных соседними объектами и 
затем достигших точки модели)" style="rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="210" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-5" value="Рассчитать коэффициент бликового освещения
(имитация рассеивания прямого луча)" style="rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="310" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-6" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-4" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-2"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="120" y="410" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="145" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-7" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-5" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="80" y="360" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="130" y="310" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-8" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-13" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-5"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="145" y="410" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-9" value="Конец цикла по точкам модели" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.loop_limit;verticalAlign=middle;direction=west;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="610" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-10" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-9"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="130" y="668" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="145" y="580" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-11" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-15" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-9"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="145" y="710" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="180" y="788" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-12" value="" style="endArrow=none;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" edge="1" parent="1" source="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-14" target="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-13"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="145" y="510" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="145" y="480" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-13" value="Рассчитать коэффициент диффузного
освещения (имитация отражения прямого луча)" style="rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="410" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-14" value="Просуммировать вычисленные компоненты 
для получения цвета" style="rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="510" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="G7qa5X8kURWROr1BMIQ6-15" value="Конец" style="strokeWidth=2;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Times New Roman;labelBorderColor=none;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="710" width="250" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
